return msg;

name: Battery Processor
func:
msg.payload = msg.battery;

name: Store Selected Site
func:
flow.set('selectedSite', msg.payload);
return msg;

name: Sensors Styling
format:
<style>
.sensors-group .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 8px;
}
.sensors-group .nr-dashboard-template {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
}
.sensor-display {
  width: 100% !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}
</style>

name: Levels Styling
format:
<style>
.levels-group .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 10px;
}
.center-gauge {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.center-gauge .value {
  text-align: center;
}
.center-gauge .title {
  text-align: center;
}
</style>

name: Last Update Display
format:
Last Update
{{msg.payload.timestamp}}

name: Status Display
format:
Status
{{msg.payload.message || 'Waiting for status...'}}

name: Error Display
format:
Error
{{msg.payload.message || 'No errors'}}
